participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: enthusiastic and caring, with a passion for music and community service.
participant_1.background: my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: outgoing and friendly, with a love for animals and sports.
participant_2.background: i've a german shepherd dog. i live in a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.
